name: City Under Siege
description:
City Under Siege The world is being invaded by an extraterrestrial horde, humans have created a weapon that can stop them, now it's up to you to use it correctly, do your best and save the world !! Summary: City Under Siege is a single player, Hyper casual game with alien Invasion Theme, where the player need to rebound the Small Ships back to the Mothership. Developed by: 3D Artist - Gustavo Silva Programmer - Luis Felipe Ávila Audío Designer- Richard Pierre Advisors: Eduardo Fernando Müller Alessandro Peixoto de LimaCelso dos Santos Junior Universidade Feevale, 2021 / 01,
Publicado em 1 de Julho de 2021.
